name: ml-e-tutoring-app
description: ML-E - Multi-agentic AI tutoring system for teaching Machine Learning to high school students

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:shared
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:shared
